info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 9:18PM EDT until July 21 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Elkhart County in north central Indiana... Southern Cass County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 917 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Edwardsburg, or near Simonton Lake, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elkhart, Simonton Lake, Cassopolis, Bristol, Edwardsburg, Union, Paradise Lake, Calvin Center, Adamsville, Juno Lake, Diamond Lake, Shavehead Lake and Eagle Lake. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 91 and 99. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
